rituals.title: Instrument the Echo Computer runner
rituals.description: Reserve one deep session to add structured telemetry plus failure hints to the sandbox runner.
steps: Profile a slow or flaky execution path and capture timing for queue, start, and teardown stages.
Add lightweight tracing or counters that surface in the terminal stream for future debugging.
Refactor one bottleneck and record before/after output for the changelog.

rituals.title: Evolve the holographic signal deck
rituals.description: Prototype a layered overlay that communicates palette, soundtrack, and story beats above the editor.
steps: Storyboard at least two overlay states (idle + focus) with annotations for transitions.
Experiment with CSS variables or shader-like descriptions to capture depth.
Publish a GIF, screenshot, or markdown walkthrough linked from the workspace.

rituals.title: Ship the collaboration radar handoff
rituals.description: Pair with a teammate to test the reviewer radar and leave a ready-to-run field kit.
steps: List recent commits for the touched file and identify two ideal reviewers.
Bundle run instructions plus screenshots or terminal logs that prove the behavior.
Share the kit, gather async feedback, and record new questions in the ritual log.
